item.title: Content Workflows for Engineering Teams
item.description: Creating documentation that engineers love requires a workflow that respects code review, version control, and automation. Treat Docs Like Code Use pull requests and review tools to ensure every edit has context and accountability. Templates for PR descriptions help reviewers focus on clarity. Automate Checks Lint markdown, enforce style guides, and generate previews. Automation keeps quality high and frees maintainers from repetitive tasks. Celebrate Updates Share doc changes in team meetings or Slack channels. Visibility encourages contributions and keeps knowledge fresh.
